h5.u: SUMMARY OF NATIONAL INSURANCE CONTRIBUTIONS DUE/IN ARREARS

div.p: 1. Please complete this form in duplicate.
WARNING: SUBMISSION OF FALSE OR MISLEADING INFORMATION IS AN OFFENSE PUNISHABLE BY LAW

div.style: font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 5px; text-align: center; padding-top: 0;padding-bottom:5px;

div.p: WHERE THE PERIOD EXCEEDS ONE MONTH, COMPLETE SECTION F GIVING SEPARATE DETAILS FOR EACH MONTH:
I solemnly and sincerely declare that the information given above is a correct reflection of my employee population and National Insurance obligations
I solemnly and sincerely declare that the information given above is a correct reflection of my employee population and National Insurance obligations.

p.u: SECTION "F" - DETAILS OF PAYMENTS FOR PERIODS EXCEEDING ONE MONTH

div.p: * Enter amounts on page 1. Sec B
